locations.title: Toad Suck Park
locations.content: Toad Suck Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … and has a terrific view of the dam and river. The reason I gave it four stars is because the bathrooms are not air conditioned and you will sweat profusely if taking a shower in the summer. The camp host, Al, is a dear and willing to …

This Corp of Engineers campground has large sites except in loop A. Some of the sites are level, most ib loop B and loop C. The bath house has individual rooms wit toilet, sink, and shower. The bath house was clean and well stocked.

… use. There were absolutely zero clothing hooks in any that I visited. Very difficult to shower and leave your clothing on the small wall hung bench while doing so. Then when getting dressed, your clothes would have to be deposited onto the …
Nice quiet, clean campsites only short ball is no AC in the shower restrooms

Friendly informative host, great shower & bathroom facilities, wonderfully maintained sites. Kudos to the service that maintains the bathrooms, as they are clean and sanitary. The permanent dweller  sites furthest from shoreline were the …
The park itself was delightful... Quiet, pretty, well maintained, easy to find, and not too remote. However, there were no pull-thrus. Shower was great.

What I don't understand about this Park is, why do so many non-campers take showers there. I have no desire to come back because of that reason
Other than that, I have no complaints, but the shower thing will keep me away.
Love this place. Few improvements needed. Shower/bathroom too hot needs more venting. And water pressure  too low.

showerReviews.reviewText: The pool was infact heated.  But everything is worn.   The males locker room showers look to be covered in mold. There is nothing but ammonia smell hitting you.   Pool was decent.  Will be going again.  This place just needs a facelift. The city needs to put more money into this
The lady at the desk is RUDE. she was on the phone while checking in. The locker rooms smells like armpits and underwear. Did not feel welcome and the pool is hot. Do not recommend.
I received the total grand tour of this facility. Indoor pools, racquetball court, basketball courts, workout facilities and other things right there in the area.

The Staff Is Friendly & Helpful From My Experience. They Offer Swim Lessons & Aerobics Classes, A Basketball Court & They Also Have A Decent Gym. My Only Problem With This Facility Is The Cleanliness Of The Women’s Bathroom, There Is A …

locations.title: Lonoke Community Center
locations.content: Lonoke Community Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this place if you’re in the Lonoke area. For the size of the place, the gym has a great variety of machines and free weights. Downstairs for free weights, and upstairs are machines and cardio stuff. Staff is great, they keep the place clean, and are all very kind. 10/10

Very nice place, relatively up to date. Facilities seem to be kept in good order. Good variety of things from basketball court, pool, weightlifting area, indoor and outdoor track, and a good list of activities to participate in. Work out …

Rented into pool for son's 10th birthday party since it was still too cold to swim outside. The staff was very Friendly and accommodating. The facility was clean and very nice.  The price was very affordable. We had an excellent experience.

Lonoke is very Blessed to have the Lonoke Community Center. I especially like the indoor pool that is open year round. This summer they even put up a floating optical course up during weekends in Aug that the kids really loved. Everyone that wks there has always been so nice & it always looks so spotless & clean. 😍🤩 …
Great place to work out and play basketball. Equipment is well maintained. The court, walking track, and showers are always very clean. Staff is always nice and helpful. I highly recommend them!

I would give it 5 but sometimes in the eve      a less desirable group of teenagers kind of take over. The facility is great, very clean, and you cant beat the price. I have seen the elderly lady at the desk get pushed around verbally by the previous mentioned riff raff. This tends to happen on Saturday when shes by herself.
It is worth the price plus some. Basketball, track, whole aaray of exercise equipment and my favorite - Olympic Size Pool!  Parties welcome. It is very well operated and very clean.
Such a nice center. Friendly employees, indoor pool, walking track, basketball, and pickle ball. Spaces are clean, and roomy. Pricing is fair and worth it.

locations.title: Planet Fitness
locations.content: Planet Fitness may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice one.  But in the shower room one small stool to put your shoes on in the whole bathroom.  Customers need more benches.

… which seems to be similar in every NWAR location, is that they only have one changing room. It seems like the showers are not utilized too much,  because of this. I did get to see a naked old man because of this, so that is always fun. …

Favorite part is the showers. Not to discount the rest of the gym but I'd almost pay the membership fee for the shower alone. The employees are pretty nice, and other than the every so often out of order equipment, the machines are pretty …

… everyday if not every day. Everything is good at this location however I have one suggestion, in the men's bathroom it would be nice to have a spot in the showers to place your shower items like soap shampoo etc. 5Stars other than that
Da'One Chosen Washington3 reviews
My only complaint is that the shower's are COLD!!!
Some of the best showers I ever seen at planet fitness. No rust on shower curtain rods . Very clean
Well spaced equipment, Fantastic shower setup (when you travel that's a PLUS)
Shower is big 👍🏻 …

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place to spend your summer days at! The gym is nice. Needs a bench but even without that it’s clean and quiet. Very nice to workout then dip in the lazy river. Very relaxing!
All 4 kids say 5 stars! only complaint is not enough bathroom stalls outside. The water slides are so fun and the lazy river is *chefs kiss*

I went specifically for the lazy river, but it was closed. The pool area—both inside and out—was completely packed. It was so crowded you could barely walk in the pool. There were no available chairs or tables, and the changing rooms had …

locations.title: Laurel Park
locations.content: Laurel Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful park in a very safe area. Police regularly patrol the area and there's lots of space to run around. This park also has a set of outdoor instruments, as well as the Waterpark features and regular park installation. It's kept up very well. And it's super clean!
The playground is nice with alot of shade and trees. the bathroom is clean. Is really good to have a nice playground .

Clean family friendly free splash park and also regular playground as well with plenty of seating right near each area! Covered pavillions for events and shade. The playground area looks new and modern with lots of activities, multiple …
Beautiful CLEAN Park! In town for the 8U World Series and visited the park with our whole team.  Splash pad was an excellent way to cool off after a long day at the ballpark.

Laurel Park is a great place to spend an afternoon! In the summer, the attached splash pad is a nice way to cool off, and a playground to warm back up. The grounds are kept clean, with trash cans readily available, Picnic tables for lunch, …
